name: Just get in through the door
name_original: Just get in through the door
description:
It’s a puzzle game. Every level is a room with a door in it. Your goal is to get in through the door. The way in is not always clear so sometimes you’ll have to figure out a clue. I tried not to repeat myself, so every level you’ll find something new.

Number of Levels: 30

Gameplay:
Clicking buttons
Running
Moving cubes

The Goal:
Get in through the door

It’s all easy.
